ovdesc.p: This live table is built whenever accounts subject to ICA processing have back valued corrections processed.
The table is keyed on the ICA main account and stores details of the oldest back value correction for all sub accounts in the group.

desc.p: The ICA sub account which has been subject to correction processing
The back valued correction date for the sub account
The ICA main account of a compensation group
The maximum proxessing level of this ICA.GROUP, obtained from the relevant ICA.GROUP.DETAIL record. This can be defined as the lowest level this group has been in an ICA hierarchy.
The lowest level groups must be corrected first, so that any balances can be migrated up the hiearchy for the higher level groups
